attributes.action: The UK government should commit to not sending a team to the Olympics re covid
attributes.additional_details:
To send sportspeople across the world during a pandemic invites the spread of new strains and further puts both the host country and returning countries at risk of cross spread
So there should be no team sent to the 2021 olympics
attributes.background: IOC are requesting sportspeople are given priority for the vaccine-over and above actual priority/vulnerable people so the Olympics can go ahead!

rejection.details: Deciding whether to participate in the Olympics is a matter for the British Olympic Association, not the Government or House of Commons.
